content.rendered: [vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_tta_accordion c_position=”right” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Is Webkey secure?” tab_id=”1583096986587-7c69f115-5c07″][vc_column_text]Yes, we can provide high security. In the last 10 years with multiple developments we have created a secure environment for Webkey App. Browser and Webkey client both use SSL communication.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How can I manage more than one device?” tab_id=”1583096986603-54a9ee0a-44f0″][vc_column_text]We have more options for the application. Service provided for individual users is to be able to control one device remotely but in case you would like to control more than 1, Business and Enterprise option is the best one for you. With a monthly fee, you can control countless devices remotely easily.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Is there any data limit?” tab_id=”1583097288399-ce2a6c25-8fe2″][vc_column_text]There is no data limit.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What payment methods are accepted?” tab_id=”1583097329918-2d4c56ad-39d5″][vc_column_text]You can pay with credit card / debit card and also with a Paypal account[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Can I have my own Webkey server?” tab_id=”1583311950171-031a4ca6-c0cd”][vc_column_text]As a part of our B2B solution we are offering to our clients also the possibility to have their own server. For further details about the Webkey server please contact us at info@webkeyapp.com.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Do I have to root my device to use Webkey?” tab_id=”1583311983504-0f28e587-1efd”][vc_column_text]Root is not necessary to use Webkey, but because of Android OS limitations some functions of our solution are available only with rooted devices or with a signed Webkey APK with Android platform key. To check our available feature list please visit the Features section at https://webkeyapp.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How to remote control Android device from any browser with Webkey?” tab_id=”1583312008331-97ac23af-afae”][vc_column_text]Once you have Webkey configured on your device, just log in to your account at dashboard.webkeyapp.com from any browser and start to take control of your device.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How to start using Webkey?” tab_id=”1583312029671-fd9ad2de-9184″][vc_column_text]Please read and follow the instructions described in this article: https://webkeyapp.com/en/getting-started/[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Failed to connect devices through Webkey?” tab_id=”1583312054583-da778297-184c”][vc_column_text]Please read and follow the instructions described in this article: https://webkeyapp.com/en/device-is-offline/[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How to delete a Webkey account?” tab_id=”1583312074173-3d3e0fb0-79a6″][vc_column_text]Please contact us via info@webkeyapp.com and let us help you.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How can I remove my device?” tab_id=”1583312100787-5dcddd83-2fca”][vc_column_text]On the dashboard under device details (three dots on the right) there is an option to remove your device.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What is the Terminal feature and how to use it?” tab_id=”1583312126817-2541bf7a-46ca”][vc_column_text]The Webkey Terminal feature enable real-time pseudo terminal access to your Android devices. To understand more about this unique feature please go to our Knowledge Base and check this article https://webkeyapp.com/en/terminal-tutorial/[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How many devices can I control in the Free plan?” tab_id=”1583312148189-21be3365-f898″][vc_column_text]The Webkey Free plan gives you the possibility to control for free one device, without any data restriction with all Webkey features included. You can start to use Webkey registering at his link: dashboard.webkeyapp.com/registration[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row]
